Unlike Idol, which allows singers 15 to 28 years old, X Factor has no upper age limit, and the judges serve as mentors. Ryan Seacrest says the shows are different enough for both to succeed. Knowing( Idol) needs to reinvent itself, knowing that if they did just phone it in this season and produce just a lackluster champion, you have the strong possibility of X Factor coming in and stealing their thunder and their zeitgeist.
